edu.iu.harp.partition

Class PartitionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.iu.harp.partition.PartitionUtil

  • public class PartitionUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utils used on partitions, including receive, regroup, rotate, gather, allgather operations and etc.
